# ğŸ—ï¸ Bookshelf Prefabs

  A collection of ready-to-use structures and templates for world-building.

> "The mother art is architecture. Without an architecture of our own we have no soul of our own civilization."
> â€” Frank Lloyd Wright

> We are searching for builders to contribute to this bundle. If you are interested, please contact us on [Discord](https://discord.gg/MkXytNjmBt) or check the dedicated [GitHub issue](https://github.com/mcbookshelf/bookshelf/issues/303).


## âœ¨ Features

- **ğŸŒ³ Tree Collection**: Various tree types including Birch, Cypress, and Dark Oak with multiple variations.
- **ğŸ¨ Tree Variations**: Each tree type comes in 5 different styles for variety.
- **ğŸŒ² Natural Look**: Trees designed to blend naturally with Minecraft's environment.
- **ğŸ”„ Future Expansion**: More structure types planned for future updates.

ğŸ“š [Read the full documentation](https://docs.mcbookshelf.dev/en/latest/index.html)

## ğŸ“– About Bookshelf

This bundle is part of the [Bookshelf Library](https://docs.mcbookshelf.dev/en/latest/index.html), a modular collection of Minecraft datapacks built to simplify complex systems and empower mapmakers.

ğŸ§© Find more modules in the [Bookshelf organization](https://modrinth.com/organization/mcbookshelf). \
ğŸ“¦ Get the full suite [Bookshelf Suite](https://modrinth.com/datapack/bookshelf-suite).
